Name: Flash Bang
Effect: Create a bunch of bright lights and piercing sounds to stun people. Use rules for stun grenades from Armory.

Name: Siphon Energy
Effect: Allows the caster to siphon mana from an electrical source or from a fire. Successes equal mana points siphoned, to a maximum of the intensity of the energy source. Note, doing this automatically extinguishes/burns out the source, regardless of how many successes gained.  Either the fuel from the fire is depleted or the electrical circuit fries.

Name: Disguise Spell
Effect: This spell allows a mage to hide an active spell from Mage Sight/Unseen Senses. Similar to the Prime 2 ability Spell Cloaks, but can now be cast on other existing spells (wards for instance). Somewhere between Spell Cloaks and Disguise Resonance.

Name: Unseen Armor
Effect: Same as Forces Shield except when a supernatural ability causes damage to be upgraded to Aggravated when spending mana (5th level spells), can spend a point of mana (per attack) to downgrade to Lethal. Or can be imbued with points of mana in advance.

Name: Extra Corporeal Shockwave
Effect: Extra corporeal shock wave. (Read about doctors who use sound waves to break up kidney stones. Send two sound waves from different directions and focus on a point where the wave becomes harmonic).  Create two Forces waves to destroy an object. Bypass Armor.  This aimed spell has a -2 penalty for extra targeting factors.

Name: Thunder Pulse
Effect: Store electricity from a source ie wall socket, and release on touch.
